trans-unit.source: Files you've previously accessed will show up here
Send the developers an issue report with more information
trans-unit.target: 개발자들에게 더 많은 정보가 담긴 리포트를 보내세요.

trans-unit.source: Show extensions for known file types
Show hidden files, folders, and drives
Open a specific page or pages
Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s)?
Show a confirmation dialog when deleting files or folders
Pick a location to extract this compressed archive to. You'll need to stay in the current folder until we're done. A new tab will open up with the extracted items.
trans-unit.target: 압축을 해제할 경로를 선택하세요. 압축 해제가 끝날 때까지 현재 폴더에 있어야 합니다. 압축 해제가 완료되면 새 탭에 표시됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once completed.
trans-unit.target: 계속하려면 파일을 표시하기 위해 권한을 부여해야 합니다. 설정이 열리면 권한을 부여하고 앱을 재시작해 주세요.

trans-unit.source: Enter an item name without an extension
Create a new item (Ctrl + Shift + N)
is a subfolder of the source folder
An item with this name already exists in this directory.
We weren't able to delete this item
Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
Pin Recycle Bin to the sidebar
The requested operation is not supported
The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름에는 다음 문자들을 사용할 수 없습니다: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름에는 다음 문자들을 사용할 수 없습니다: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete all items?
Enter password to unlock the drive
Please check the password and try again.
When launching an item from the jumplist
Open folder in a new tab
Can't access any items to display
The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: 대상 폴더와 원본 폴더의 이름이 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
Show a horizontal tab strip on the title bar
trans-unit.target: 제목 표시줄에 수평 탭 스트립 표시

trans-unit.source: See who contributed to Files UWP
Find out what's new in Files UWP
